about.title: About
about.text:
I'm Ndiaga Ndiaye â€” a **Problem Solver** and **Digital Transporter**. I'm your **Swiss Army Knife** for digital challenges.

I transform complex business problems into elegant digital solutions. Whether it's building scalable web applications, designing intuitive user interfaces, optimizing performance, or implementing robust backend systems â€” I deliver end-to-end solutions.

My expertise spans FullStack development, backend architecture, frontend design, DevOps, Progressive Web Apps, and exploring AI integration and machine learning solutions.

With over 4 years of experience, I founded **Kamit Digital Solutions** to support African startups in their digital transformation by providing solutions tailored to their needs and budgets.

**Ready to solve your next digital challenge?** [Let's connect!](/contact)
